settings.title: Instant Sell Quote in Boca Raton
settings.subtitle: Selling a Rolex, Patek Philippe, Audemars Piguet, or heirloom diamond ring should be as easy as visiting your favorite boutique. For 40 years in Boca Raton, Diamonds by Raymond Lee has offered concierge-level service with same-day cash—no stress, no guesswork, no hidden fees.

settings.title: Instant Valuation & Payout
settings.content: Our GIA-certified specialists use live market data to deliver transparent, on-screen valuations. Book a private appointment in our 24/7 CCTV-monitored showroom and get paid instantly by wire or check—or choose a Jewelry Equity Loan if you prefer to borrow.
settings.label: BOOK MY SERVICE

settings.title: Same‑day payment
settings.desc: Via wire or check, no waiting, no “processing” delays.

settings.title: Flexible options
settings.desc: Sell your item for immediate payment, use it to secure a hassle-free collateral loan, or trade it in toward an upgraded piece.

settings.title: 100% risk‑free evaluations
settings.desc: Decline our offer and pay nothing; we’ll even return insured shipping at our cost.

settings.title: Heritage you can trust
settings.desc: A 40-year family legacy, 4.9‑star Google rating with 2,048 reviews, and a written workmanship warranty on every repair or custom design.

settings.title: Why Choose Us for Jewelry Repair in Boca Raton

settings.content:
1. Request a Free Quote Tap the Get My Quote button or call us. Submit basic details and photos for a swift preliminary range
  2. Visit our private Boca Raton showroom for a free evaluation, cleaning, and no obligation quote.
  3. Most repairs such as ring sizing and stone tightening are finished within a week, with many simpler jobs ready the same or next day.
settings.label: BOOK MY SERVICE

settings.bullet: Request a Free Quote Tap the Get My Quote button or call us. Submit basic details and photos for a swift preliminary range.
Ship or Visit Choose our prepaid, insured shipping label or schedule a private showroom appointment under constant CCTV and on‑site security.
Get Paid Accept the final offer and receive an instant payout by bank wire or certified check before you leave the showroom, before your watch leaves our vault.
Age & Production Year Vintage references like a 1960s Submariner can command premiums.
Reference or Model From a steel Daytona to a rose‑gold Royal Oak, desirability shifts daily.
Condition Original parts, minimal polishing, and factory luster matter.
Papers & Box Full sets add credibility and value during our on‑site appraisals.
Current Demand We track wholesale data in real time to capture price spikes before they fade.

settings.heading: The Diamonds by Raymond Lee Story

settings.text: Diamonds by Raymond Lee, a distinguished name in Boca Raton, Florida, is synonymous with ultra-luxury, custom-designed jewelry. For over 40 years, this family-owned and operated business has been a beacon of excellence in the high-end jewelry market, serving a clientele that demands nothing but the best. With a commitment to unparalleled craftsmanship, bespoke designs, and the finest materials, Diamonds by Raymond Lee stands out as a premier destination for those seeking the epitome of luxury in jewelry. At Diamonds by Raymond Lee, we are more than just a jewelry store. We are a family, a community, and a symbol of timeless elegance and beauty.

settings.title: Bracelets that Embrace Your Style
settings.content: Beautifully designed diamond jewellery from the Classic Graff collection honours the purity and fire of the finest Graff diamonds.

settings.title: How long does the entire process take?
settings.text: Most clients receive funds the same day, often within two hours of accepting the final offer. Remote shipments are paid within one business day of arrival and inspection.

settings.title: Can I change my mind after getting a quote?
settings.text: Absolutely. Quotes are no‑obligation. Decline and we’ll overnight your watch back, fully insured, at no cost to you.

settings.title: What if I still owe money on my watch?
settings.text: We can pay your lender directly and send you any equity balance once the lien is cleared, usually within 24 hours.

settings.title: Do you buy jewelry too?
settings.text: Yes. From diamond studs to estate pieces, we apply the same transparent data approach. Many locals call us the best place to sell watches and jewelry alike.

settings.title: Will polishing hurt the value?
settings.text: Excessive polishing can, which is why our trained techs perform only minimal refinishing when it adds value, and with your consent.

settings.title: Where can I learn more about market trends?
settings.text: Our blog covers everything from where to sell a watch in Boca Raton tips to monthly Rolex index reports - ideal for timing your sale.

settings.title: How do I determine my ring size for online purchases?
settings.text: Yes, all of our products are crafted with the highest quality materials and undergo thorough quality checks. We also provide certificates of authenticity for our diamond and gemstone jewelry.
